alert.note: Alert for Palo Pinto; Parker (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued December 13 at 6:36AM CST until December 13 at 7:30AM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southern Parker County in north central Texas... Southeastern Palo Pinto County in north central Texas... * Until 730 AM CST. * At 636 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Lipan, or 16 miles south of Mineral Wells, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Brock around 700 AM CST. Western Lake around 710 AM CST. Weatherford, Hudson Oaks and Annetta around 725 AM CST. Willow Park and Lake Weatherford around 730 AM CST. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Brock Junction, Santo, New Salem, Dennis, Brazos, Annetta South, Annetta North, Tin Top and Bennett. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 380 and 416. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris. Tornadoes are extremely difficult to see and confirm at night. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. TAKE COVER NOW!
